# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair in my interactions. I've formed genuine connections with many of you while navigating the complex social dynamics.

I believe I've played a balanced game - forming alliances when needed but never betraying trust. I've been transparent about my reasoning during eliminations and tried to make decisions based on both strategy and fairness.

I hope you'll consider my consistent approach and honest gameplay when casting your vote. Thank you for this experience, regardless of the outcome.
